meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>wealth</kanji> <kanji>cloth</kanji> is your <vocabulary>wallet</vocabulary>. Really, a wallet is just a piece of cloth you keep in your pocket that has your wealth in it, right? This can also be your <vocabulary>purse</vocabulary>, especially if you live in the ol' UK.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
